p: Another type of passivation process was the process with ZrOCl 2 and H 2SiF 6. The materials labeled Si_Ref and Zr_Ref were fabricated without the use of Si and Zr. The C_Ref sample was not conserved in the mineral oil, whereas the C_Oil sample was immersed in the mineral oil. The sample containing zirconium was immersed in a bath containing ZrOCl 2 according to the description given in Table 2.
